Terms & conditions

CREDITS 

Bioforce is recognised as a general interest association

Bioforce
41 avenue du 8 mai 1945,
69200 Vénissieux, France

Digital Agency: Hula-Hoop
Photo credits : ECHO, Bioforce, Julien Faure, Didier Tarou, Aurélie Girard, Damien Lehalle, Hervé Hugues, Philippe Merchez, Tony Serrano,.

Domain registrar and web hosting:
Nuxit (Groupe Magic Online)- 97-97bis rue Général Mangin – 38100 GRENOBLE FRANCE

Terms of Use

LEGAL INFORMATION

As a training and guidance organisation, Bioforce provides this website to promote its activities and inform the general public and professionals about its training and services in the field of international solidarity.

The “Institut Bioforce Développement” is an association under the law of 1901, registered with the Journal Officiel on 24/12/1986 (registration number with the Rhône Prefecture: 069 102 26 87). The association is based at 41 avenue du 8 mai 1945 in Vénissieux. In accordance with current legislation, this site has been declared to the Commission Nationale Informatique et Liberté (declaration receipt no. 1005579).

President of Bioforce: Bernard Sinou
Managing Director: Dorothée Lintner

Intellectual property This website is the property of Bioforce, an association under the law of 1901, registered with the Journal Officiel on 24/12/1986 (declaration number with the Rhône prefecture: 069 102 26 87). The general structure, texts, images and all other elements making up this site are the exclusive property of Bioforce and are protected by copyright.

Unless expressly authorised, it is forbidden to represent or reproduce, even partially, the content of this site or any of its elements, particularly for commercial purposes.

Liability Bioforce accepts no liability for : Errors or omissions in this web site, which does not claim to be exhaustive Viruses originating from this web site The content or use that may be made of third party sites to which the Bioforce site refers by hypertext link, as Bioforce has no control over these sites. Bioforce cannot be held responsible for any damage whatsoever resulting from the use or interpretation of the information available on this server, nor for any damage resulting from the impossibility of accessing the data on this site.
